               java.lang.String itunesImage,
               java.lang.String itunesCategory,
               java.lang.String itunesKeywords)
        Creates a RSS files for a list of courses
        Parameters:
        courses - the list of courses
        filePath - the full path of the RSS file to create
        rssName - the name of the RSS files
        rssTitle - the title of the RSS file
        rssDescription - the description of the RSS file
        serverUrl - the URL of the application on the server
        rssImageUrl - the URL of the RSS image file
        recordedInterfaceUrl - the URL of the recorded interface
        language - the language of the RSS file
        rssCategory - the category of the RSS file
        itunesAuthor - The itunes author
        itunesSubtitle - The itunes subtitle
        itunesSummary - The itunes summary
        itunesImage - The itunes image
        itunesCategory - The itunes category
        itunesKeywords - The itunes keywords
